topics.body:
I just thought of something.
I should write an article for a newspaper by sending it a letter.
I will do this anonymously to avoid any protests.

I should talk about the negative effects of religion today and how the old ways used by prophets, hundreds of years ago, do not fit with the current era and that some rules must change in order to survive the changing of the world. I would also talk about how the laws of morality must fit with the views of today's generation to avoid any further conflict and that despite the effectiveness of punishment done by the old world, it won't do much effect to the new world with its ever-expanding social technology and that such actions would only bring the downfall of the religion itself.

I should post it at the right time so that if it were to be in the newspaper, I would be somewhere where they can't suspect me.











Wow, I'm speaking like I'm some kind of criminal.
